revised_title: An Investigation of Thallium Vapour Absorption and Dispersion
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the absorption and dispersion of thallium vapour. They found that the non-luminous vapour absorbs lines of the sharp and diffuse series and discovered anomalous dispersion at 3775 (1, 7r2-d, a) and very feeble anomalous dispersion at A 5350 *6. These findings provide valuable information about the quantum state of atoms in the normal state and the critical potentials of elements in this group.
